home.title: Meal Plans
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Meal Plan

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Meal Plan {{ id }}?

help.authorId: Id of author of the plan
help.name: Plan name
help.isVisible: Flag specifying if meal plan is visible in author's list of meal plans
help.isLocked: Flag specifying if meal plan is editable
help.language: Language tag of a meal plan as ISO_639-1 code
help.totalDailyEnergy: Amount of total energy per day in kcal
help.percentOfProtein: Percent of proteins in total daily energy. Sum of percents of protein, fat and carbohydrates must not be larger than 100
help.percentOfFat: Percent of fats in total daily energy. Sum of percents of protein, fat and carbohydrates must not be larger than 100
help.percentOfCarbohydrates: Percent of carbohydrates in total daily energy. Sum of percents of protein, fat and carbohydrates must not be larger than 100

mealplansMealPlan.created: A new Meal Plan is created with identifier {{ param }}
mealplansMealPlan.updated: A Meal Plan is updated with identifier {{ param }}
mealplansMealPlan.deleted: A Meal Plan is deleted with identifier {{ param }}
